#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int a,b,c;
	while(scanf("%d %d %d",&a,&b,&c)!=EOF)
	{
		if(b<0) b = -1*b;
		if(c<0) c = -1*c;
		if(a<0) a = -1*a;
		int g = 1 ;
		if(__gcd(__gcd(a,b),c) != g ) printf("NO\n") ;
		else
		{
			(c*c == a*a + b*b)?printf("YES\n"):printf("NO\n");
		}
	}
	return 0 ;
}
